name: Sakana-san's Ungrateful Job
description:
Can you imagine how ungrateful should be to punch the clock every single day and work under pressure to serve a pile of fresh cadavers of your own kind to a bunch of monstrous, and impetuous frogs? That's the stressful routine of poor Sakana's san.

Ballance the tower of sushi while rushing through a restaurant full of starving customers that can literally eat you alive if you screw with their orders.

CONTROLS
